title: Fred's Films. Stepping South: Apollo Bay Jan 1963
other_title: Freds Films. Stepping South: Apollo Bay Jan '63
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Home movies and video
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Description and travel
abstract: A road trip to the glorious beaches of Apollo Bay and surrounds is just the ticket for a relaxing summer holiday and 8mm travelogue home movie.
description: It's summer 1963, time to pack up the car and head to the beach. Fred Daley, steam train enthusiast and 8mm home movie maker, follows his family's trip to the beaches of Apollo Bay, the lush rain forest of Paradise and the powerful beauty of the Twelve Apostles. Along the way we also see Lorne, Port Campbell and Cinema Point in the Otway Ranges.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003058; Steam trains and holidays: the home movies of Fred Daley; Active; 2015
